tasks.task: Installing irrigation in a high tunnel for a farm.
subtasks: Positioning the header pipe near the water tower.
Running a 90-degree pipe to direct the water flow.
Attaching three-quarter-inch hose to the end of the pipe.
Setting up a garden hose adapter and ensuring a secure connection.
Considering safety measures (e.g., Teflon tape) during connections.
Splicing into the half-inch poly pipe for the drip tape.
Using irrigation components like filters, spike clips, and pressure regulators.
Terminating the drip tape connections with folding and Gorilla tape.
Assembling a Bluetooth hose end irrigation controller for scheduling.
Securing loose ends and waterproofing connections.
Documenting the process for future reference (planned for next video due to weather).
